evidence.text: The Agency Defendants and Agency Head Defendants and their officers, agents, attorneys, and any person acting in concert with them, or at their behest, and who has knowledge of this injunction, are preliminarily enjoined from implementing or enforcing against plaintiffs and their members Section 2 of Executive Order 14251, Exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs, 90 Fed. Reg. 14553 (Apr. 3, 2025).

extracted.value: The Agency Defendants and Agency Head Defendants and their officers, agents, attorneys, and any person acting in concert with them, or at their behest, and who has knowledge of this injunction, are preliminarily enjoined from implementing or enforcing against plaintiffs and their members Section 2 of Executive Order 14251, Exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs, 90 Fed. Reg. 14553 (Apr. 3, 2025).

evidence.text: The Court orders that plaintiffs post a $60,000 bond under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(c) by 12:00 p.m. California time on July 1, 2025.

extracted.value: The Court orders that plaintiffs post a $60,000 bond under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(c) by 12:00 p.m. California time on July 1, 2025.

evidence.text: The Court grants the government’s motion for a stay of the district court’s injunction pending appeal.

extracted.value: The Court grants the government’s motion for a stay of the district court’s injunction pending appeal.
